Class Post

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.bl.models.Post
public class Post extends Object
Represents a post in the Pick'n'Pic application. A post can have various attributes such as text, number of likes, number of comments, and creation date.

    • Post

      public Post(int id, int userId, String text, int nbLikes, int nbComments, Date creationDate, List<Comment> Comments, List<Like> Likes)
      Constructs a new Post instance with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the post.
      userId - The ID of the user who created the post.
      text - The text content of the post.
      nbLikes - The number of likes the post has received.
      nbComments - The number of comments on the post.
      creationDate - The date the post was created.
      Comments - The list of comments on the post.
      Likes - The list of likes on the post.
